full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
===============

**Competition ID**: EC016-250376
--------------------------------

The Government of Canada is seeking offers from qualified firms to provide specialized building construction services for a Building Condition Report (BCR) in Moncton, New Brunswick, under the Supply Arrangement (SA) E0225-152290 for Architectural and Interior Design Services.

**Notice Details**
-----------------

*   **Publication Date**: July 11, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 26, 2024 (2:00 PM EST)
*   **Location**: Moncton, New Brunswick, Canada
*   **Subject Matter**: The successful bidder will be responsible for developing a comprehensive building condition report, providing detailed technical and financial information to inform the development of building management plans and asset management plans.

**Supplier Pre-Qualification and Invitation to Bid**
----------------------------------------------

Qualified firms will be invited to bid through a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued against the SA E0225-152290. A shortlist of eight firms, specializing in architecture, was selected based on their qualifications and experience.

**Procurement Details**
---------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Evaluation Criteria**: The highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to select the successful bidder.

**Contracting Entity**
------------------

The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Carlos Castillo Nieto, PSPC, can be reached for inquiries at:
carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
